text: Liris is a genus of solitary, ground-nesting, predaceous wasps, containing over 300 species. It contains two subgenera: Leptolarra and Motes, with most of the species falling within subgenus Leptolarra. ==See also== * List of Liris species ==References== Category:Crabronidae Category:Apoidea genera
title: Liris (insect)
